titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LVIII in the successful 104th season of the National Football League.
A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LVIII in the successful 104th season of the National Football League.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Kansas City Chiefs for their victory in Super Bowl LVIII.
